TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LegendCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 表示圖例項目中的圖例資料格。

span.span: Represents a legend cell in a legend item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 圖例會填入圖例項目，都由。A legend is populated with legend items, which are represented by the . 這些圖例項目包含的個別圖例資料格，接著由。These legend items consist of individual legend cells, which are in turn represented by the .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來對齊文字，數列符號或將圖例資料格內的映像。The property is used to align text, series symbols or images within the legend cell.

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the legend cell.

value.span: 值，用於繪製圖例資料格的背景。

span.span: A value used to draw the legend cell's background.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性時設定的任何實體的背景色彩的圖例中，具有最高優先權。The property has the highest priority when setting the background color of any entity in the legend.

summary.span: 取得或設定用於繪製圖例資料格內容的水平資料格數量。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of horizontal cells used to draw the contents of the legend cell.

value.span: 值，表示用於繪製圖例資料格內容的水平資料格數量。

span.span: An value that represents the number of horizontal cells used to draw the legend cell contents.

value.span: 預設值為 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果儲存格的內容必須延伸超過儲存格的寬度，您可以設定屬性設成內容所需的資料格數目。If the cell contents must extend beyond the cell width, you can set the property to the number of cells required to fit the contents. 這個屬性是最常使用，如果您想要加入的擴充的標題或圖例的標題。This property is most often used if you wish to add an extended header or title to the legend. 當這個屬性設定為值大於 1 時，必須加入空的圖例資料格，以便容納擴充的圖例資料格的內容。When this property is set to a value larger than 1, empty legend cells must be added in order to accommodate the contents of the extended legend cell.

member this.CellType : System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用來定義圖例資料格內容的圖例資料格類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the legend cell type that is used to define the contents of the legend cell.

value.span: 列舉值，表示用來定義圖例資料格內容的類型。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the type that is used to define the contents of the legend cell.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定將會顯示在每個個別的圖例資料格的內容類型。The property determines the type of content that will be displayed in each individual legend cell. 您必須指定下列一種資料格類型：One of the following cell types must be specified: - Text： 指定字串使用屬性，並會顯示在圖例資料格。Text: A string is specified using the property, and will be displayed in the legend cell. - Seriessymbol 5d;: 一系列的符號定義由屬性類別。SeriesSymbol: A series symbol is defined by the property in the class. 它會顯示為圖例資料格。It will be displayed for the legend cell. 請記住，一系列的符號是一種視覺指標-線條、 矩形或標記。Recall that a series symbol is a visual indicator—a line, rectangle or marker. 當設，所有的標記屬性的自訂項目套用至資料格。When is set to , all marker attributes of the custom item apply to the cell. - 影像： 影像已定義使用屬性，將會顯示在圖例資料格。Image: An image is defined using the property and will be displayed in the legend cell.

value.span: 物件，表示圖例資料格的字型。

span.span: The default value is "Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以用來設定圖例資料格的字型屬性。The property can be used to set font properties of the legend cell. 如果您嘗試變更這個屬性物件在執行階段，會發生編譯錯誤。If you attempt to change the properties of this object at run time, a compilation error will occur. 若要在執行階段設定字型屬性，您必須建立新物件。To set font properties at run time, you must create a new object.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格的邊界。

span.span: Gets or sets the margins of the legend cell.

value.span: 物件，表示圖例資料格之上、下、左、右邊界的值。

value.span: 上、下、左和右的預設值為 "0,0,15,15"。

span.span: The default values for top, bottom, left and right are "0,0,15,15".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 邊界會以百分比表示的圖例資料格的字型大小。Margins are measured as a percentage of the font size for the legend cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 圖例資料格的名稱必須是唯一的。否則會擲回例外狀況。The name of the legend cell must be unique; otherwise an exception will be thrown. 屬性可用來當做索引子時擷取物件從。The property can be used as the indexer when retrieving a object from the . 如果您將這個屬性設為零長度字串，就會擲回例外狀況。If you set this property to a zero-length string, an exception will be thrown.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格的工具提示文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip text for the legend cell.

value.span: 值，表示圖例資料格工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip for the legend cell.

value.span: 預設值為零長度字串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ToolTip`屬性設定圖例項目和圖例資料格，圖例資料格屬性的優先順序。If the `ToolTip` property is set for both a legend item and a legend cell, the legend cell property has precedence. 這屬性可讓您設定要顯示不同類型的圖表相關資料的特殊關鍵字。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data.
